title: Apple’s Self-Created Screens, Muni-Bond Upgrades, Uber Pausing Autonomous Car Tests
itunes:title: Apple’s Self-Created Screens, Muni-Bond Upgrades, Uber Pausing Autonomous Car Tests
description:
Guest Host Pimm Fox speaks with Mark Gurman, Bloomberg News Technology Reporter, and Ramon Llamas, Research Director at IDC, about Apple secretly designing their own displays to replace Samsung screens. Charles Doraine, CEO at Doraine Wealth Management, discusses muni-bond upgrades outpacing downgrades for a third straight year. Bloomberg Tech Reporter Mark Bergen explains that Uber has halted autonomous vehicle tests after one of its cars struck and killed a woman in Tempe, Arizona. Ivan Feinseth, Chief Investment Officer at Tigress Financial, and Sarah Frier, Bloomberg News Tech Reporter, discuss Facebook facing pressure over a political firm harvesting personal data.  ostsHWe Drive to the Close with Margie Patel, Senior Portfolio Manager at Wells Fargo Asset Management.
